headline: Jim Cramer Says “Apple Should Have a Good Multi-Year Story to Tell”
summary: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is one of the stocks in focus in the game plan Jim Cramer shared. Cramer highlighted how he feels about the stock’s rally, as he remarked: “After the close, we hear from two controversial stocks for different reasons, Apple and Amazon. They could not be in more different shapes right now… Apple […]
